sequence:
Enter: Akatsuki, The Ninja!

<size=45>Chapter 6 - In The Dark</size>

scripts.say: The lights in the office had gone out, rendering it pitch black. I wasn't sure how much time had passed...
I'm such a hopeless case...
I'm supposed to a brave nameship, yet without my rigging, I dare not tread in dark places...
But... I MUST be brave! Dark places, more than anywhere else, are where ninjas should excel...!
Guh... And yet, my legs refuse to move...
It felt like Akatsuki was tightening her embrace of me.
I'm glad to have someone as kind, dependable, and mature as you, Commander.
When I'm with you, I feel the courage within me start to well up.
J-just let it well a little more, then I will clear the darkness enveloping us!
... Wait a moment, if I recall correctly, there was a flashlight lying somewhere on the desk...
S-so I was right!
Akatsuki let go of me then went to the desk and felt around to find the flashlight.
Ah! I've found it! Thank goodness!
Akatsuki turned it on without any further delay.
... Huh?
The flashlight illuminated the face of a certain person who must've come in after the lights went out.
Eek?!
Frightened by the sudden appearance of someone she wasn't expecting, Akatsuki fainted.
I just wanted to check how you were doing since I was in the area... Hey, a-are you okay?!
In the end, it took a while for the lights (and Akatsuki) to return to normal.
Apparently, the outage was caused by an experiment the research department was conducting... But that's a story for another time.
